hypothesis that if you treated a professional athlete like an equity and a professional sports team like a
portfolio and we applied the same sort of analytics and software analytics on
top of the that we developed for the Bloomberg terminal on top of the rich amount of data that's collected in
professional sports we could build a business that would help professional sports teams manage their operations

real estate so on and so forth and what we found was the way you procure manage
and deploy infrastructure for a 25-year-old highly operationalized business like the Bloomberg terminal is
not the way you should do it for a bunch of startup businesses that you're not sure are going to be around for six months we were spending many millions of
dollars on infrastructure and making all of these businesses far less attractive Investments than they should have been
